channel.title: coil on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
channel.description: Recent content in coil on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery

item.title: Storage and Transportation
item.description: To store or transport the system within the facility, perform the following: Route the camera cable. a. Disconnect the camera cable from the camera. b. Wrap camera cable around the camera cable coil. Route the power cable. a. Disconnect the power cable from the outlet. b. Wrap power cable around the power cable coil. If the system includes a connected DataFusion device, disconnect the cable on the other device.

item.title: Cart
item.description: The cart receives video input from the camera and additional data from other connected devices, and then outputs the results on the monitor. 1 Primary Display – Produces 3840 x 2160p 3D resolution video. 3D images require passive, circularly-polarized 3D glasses. 2 Cable access – Routes cables from inside the system to external devices. 3 Front panel connectors – Includes 2 USB, an HDMI output, and a composite connector.
